overview:
Rob Schatzel is the VP of Business Development at Ground Truth.

Rob brings a wealth of experience successfully building market research businesses. With a background in advertising, media and online consumer behavior, Rob has an acute understanding of client needs that make him a valuable asset to both the sales and product organizations at Ground Truth.

Rob joined Ground Truth from Experian Hitwise, where he was responsible for all direct new business sales for the North American operation of Hitwise, Experianâ€™s online competitive intelligence service. Before Experianâ€™s acquisition of Hitwise, Rob was responsible for architecting Hitwiseâ€™s U.S. sales methodology and building its business development sales teams in New York and San Francisco.

Prior to Experian Hitwise, Rob was at Insight Express, which provides targeted, real-time market feedback through online surveys.

Robâ€™s entry into the market research business was at Jupiter Research, providing syndicated and customized new media research and advisory services to the worldâ€™s largest advertising agencies.

Rob earned his bachelorâ€™s degree at the S.I. Newhouse School of Public Communication at Syracuse University.
